TopicTitle: new website or a pard of the existing 2 website

Articles.Content:
A attempt from me for you to understand the context of suggestions and bugs.

you should make a whole refresh of this place. It's old and it't like when updating Kerbal Space Program 1 that will never be as good as Kerbal Space Program 2 because it's a whole other foundation. It's the same with this place.

You need a new foundation. It will be good for you because you can do a lot more new things that can become achievable for what is needed for interacting between developers and users of Kerbal Space Program 2  and for the user of Kerbal Space Program 2 who needs to have acces to more freedom when using this place as communication site.

This place is made up of topics just like mail is and  most know how it feels to have thousand of mails in one list of different topics. It just seems vary cramped. 

I want:

  • to share pictures and videos
  • and have a good overview of the different places, but, when I have to move around by looking at very small text fields up in the corner. It just seems to me vary cramped.

a solution

Instead make buttons for different topics. Vary big topics that will be seen many times in a long time should have pictures that shows what it is about, text and animations.

what I would have if I had want a wanted.

  • much more free to move around 
  • good looking with buttons and pictures 
  • easy to have a overview
  • a place that is easy to talk with other about suggestions and bugs and you as developers of Kerbal Space Program 2.
  • easy to access
